data.text: O Moapɨn atrivim, e Moapian gumazamiziba ara iza Idomɨn nguibar ekiam Selan iti.
Egh me kamaghɨn Judan gumazamizibav mɨkɨm,
Ezɨ, e kamaghsua, ia en akaba tuisɨghɨva, kotɨn aven guizɨn arazimɨn gɨn mangɨ en akuragh.
E uari, e Moapian gumazamizir aragharuiba, ia e ateghtɨ,
eghtɨ danganir kamɨn, atrivir mam otogham.
Ezɨ Judaba Moapian akar kam baregha, me kamaghɨn uarira uariv gei,
Me uaghan uan wainɨn azenir aghuir Hesbonɨn nguibar ekiam ko, Sipman nguibar ekiamɨn boroghɨra itibagh nɨghnɨgha,
“Kɨ Jaserɨn nguibar ekiam ko, Sipman wainɨn azeniba bagha azi.
Wainɨn azenir kaba, da fomɨra bar puvɨra be,
Kamaghɨn amizɨ, kɨ Moapia ko, Kirheresɨn nguibar ekiamɨn gumazamiziba bagha nan navim bar oseme.
Moapian gumazamiziba uan asebar ziaba fasa mɨghsɨabar ghuavanega,
Moapia ikuvighamin mɨgɨrɨgɨar kaba, Ikiavɨra Itir God bar fomɨram dagh amigha gɨfa.

Egha Ikiavɨra Itir God datɨrɨghɨn ua kamaghɨn mɨgei, “Moapia uan bizir aghuiba sara bar gɨvaghamin azenir 3plara iti. 3plan azenir kabanang, dar arueba kɨ vaghvagha, bar deraghavɨra da medi. Ezɨ namba 3ɨn azenimɨn, kɨ mɨkemezɨ moghɨn kɨ bizir kabar amuam. Moapɨn ziam datɨrɨghɨn bar pɨn iti, egh a gɨn bar gɨvagham. Gumazamizir bar avɨrim datɨrɨghɨn kantri Moapɨn iti, eghtɨ men kantri ikuvamin dughiamɨn, gumazamizir varazira an ikɨva gavgaviba puvatɨgham.”
